parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. You can view the application name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: OnlyStream
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return only specific parameters. Valid values:

*   **yes**: returns only the DomainName, AppName, StreamName, and PublishTime parameters.
*   **no**: returns all parameters. This is the default value.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 3000. Default value: 2000.

parameters.name: QueryType
parameters.description:
The mode in which stream names are matched. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy** (default): fuzzy match
*   **strict**: exact match

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. You can specify only one live stream. You can view the stream name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: StreamType
parameters.description:
The type of the streams to query. Valid values:

*   **all** (default): all streams
*   **raw**: source streams
*   **trans**: transcoded streams
